div.ab:
لقد خلت خلت وراحــت وتعدّلت بالأنس منهم وحشتي
لم أزل بعدهم أبكي عليهم طول نهاري وأواصله بليلــتي
تراهم يعودوا لمنازلهم وترجع مسلّمة فهي ى
أسما أم موسي
نافه

la qad ḫalat ḥallat *** wa rāḥat wa taʿaddalat bi ăl ʾunsi min hum waḥšat ī
lam ʾazal baʿda hum ʾabkī ʿalay him ṭūla nahār ī wa ʾuwāṣilu hu bi laylat ī
tarā hum yaʿūdū li manāzili him wa tarǧiʿ musallamaẗ:an fa hiya *** ***ī
ʾasmāʾu ʾummu mūsà
*** ***nāfh

[She/it] had come and gone, and, thanks to their companionship, my longing has since subdued.
Now that they are gone as well, I am weeping over their departure, day and night. Now that they are gone too, I am weeping over their departure, crying all day long, well into night. /
O, would they come back soon? Would he/it return safely [......]? O, would they come back soon? Would the caravan return safely? ...
Asmā Umm Mūsā
